Text:
function EP02_30()
    --.エピローグ-1【6月第4週】「見つめる者」
    SaveData.Title = "見つめる者"

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    -- //BU：ウラン、モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
        LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Princess Election Management Committee】
 "Lady Uran. The cleanup has been completed safely." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Thank you. I apologize for always entrusting you with such difficult tasks." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Princess Election Management Committee】
 "Not at all. Being involved in the management of the traditional Princess Election is truly an honor." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Princess Election Management Committee】
 "Well, this election was difficult to manage since, for the first time in its long history, male participants were involved..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "...Is it really true that the appeal was Erika Ikusa's idea?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Princess Election Management Committee】
 "Eh? Yes, it should be. I heard it was Erika Ikusa's idea, with Daria Himegami smoothing the way with the board to make it happen." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "I see. Thank you. Please take care on your way home." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Princess Election Management Committee】
 "Thank you very much, Lady Uran. Well then, farewell." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Yes. Farewell<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(600)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --//BU：ウラン、モブ女子生徒×２
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,100,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,500,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran-knight_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran’s Knight】
 "Lady Uran. As expected, is it true about Erika Ikusa……?" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Nothing has been decided yet. Let us proceed with caution." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】真剣
 "Whether Erika Ikusa is an 'infiltrator' threatening this academy…" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_31")

end
